r_ele.r: じんこうにかいしゃする

sense.gloss: to become well-known, to become common knowledge, to become famous, to be on everyone's lips
invisible writing revealed by applying heat, writing done in invisible ink
to bring into the open, to reveal, to uncover (e.g. evidence), to bring to light
to warm (e.g. one's hands over a fire), to dry
to toast, to grill, to broil, to roast, to scorch
being influenced by (someone) after developing a close association
burning at the stake, burning to death
cooking meat, fish, etc. over flames
basket made of bamboo or wire mesh (for drying clothes, cooking rice cakes, etc.)
